product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag - Small
long_description: The Sea to Summit small Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag has multiple internal pockets for personalized organizing. The hanging design is extremely convenient to use. Multiple internal mesh pockets provide content visibility. Durable YKK(TM) zippers with Hypalon(TM) grab tabs provide long-lasting and secure opening and closing. Sea to Summit Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag is crafted from super lightweight, strong and water-resistant Ultra-Sil(TM) fabric.
short_description: The Sea to Summit small Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag has multiple internal pockets for personalized organizing. The hanging design is extremely convenient to use.
